member.name: T:Modbus.Data.DataStore
member.summary: Object simulation of device memory map. The underlying collections are thread safe when using the ModbusMaster API to read/write values. You can use the SyncRoot property to synchronize direct access to the DataStore collections.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Serial Line only. Diagnostic function which loops back the original data. NModbus only supports looping back one ushort value, this is a limitation of the "Best Effort" implementation of the RTU protocol.
member.returns: Return true if slave device echoed data.

member.name: E:Modbus.Device.ModbusSlave.ModbusSlaveRequestReceived

member.name: E:Modbus.Device.ModbusSlave.WriteComplete
member.summary: Raised when a Modbus slave receives a write request, after processing the write portion of the function.
member.remarks: For Read/Write Multiple registers (function code 23), this method is raised after writing and before reading.

member.summary: Number of times to retry sending message after encountering a failure such as an IOException, TimeoutException, or a corrupt message.

member.name: P:Modbus.IO.ModbusTransport.RetryOnOldResponseThreshold
member.summary: If non-zero, this will cause a second reply to be read if the first is behind the sequence number of the request by less than this number. For example, set this to 3, and if when sending request 5, response 3 is read, we will attempt to re-read responses.

member.name: P:Modbus.IO.ModbusTransport.SlaveBusyUsesRetryCount
member.summary: If set, Slave Busy exception causes retry count to be used. If false, Slave Busy will cause infinite retries

member.name: P:Modbus.IO.ModbusTransport.WaitToRetryMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds the tranport will wait before retrying a message after receiving an ACKNOWLEGE or SLAVE DEVICE BUSY slave exception response.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds before a timeout occurs when a read operation does not finish.

member.name: T:Modbus.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.Acknowlege
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specialized use in conjunction with programming commands. The server (or slave) has accepted the request and is processing it, but a long duration of time will be required to do so. This response is returned to prevent a timeout error from occurring in the client (or master). The client (or master) can next issue a Poll Program Complete message to determine if processing is completed..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.EmptyEndPoint
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument endPoint cannot be empty..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.GatewayPathUnavailable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specialized use in conjunction with gateways, indicates that the gateway was unable to allocate an internal communication path from the input port to the output port for processing the request. Usually means that the gateway is misconfigured or overloaded..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.GatewayTargetDeviceFailedToRespond
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specialized use in conjunction with gateways, indicates that no response was obtained from the target device. Usually means that the device is not present on the network..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.HexCharacterCountNotEven
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hex string must have even number of characters..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.IllegalDataAddress
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The data address received in the query is not an allowable address for the server (or slave). More specifically, the combination of reference number and transfer length is invalid. For a controller with 100 registers, the PDU addresses the first register as 0, and the last one as 99. If a request is submitted with a starting register address of 96 and a quantity of registers of 4, then this request will successfully operate (address-wise at least) on registers 96, 97, 98, 99. If a request is submitted with [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.IllegalDataValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A value contained in the query data field is not an allowable value for server (or slave). This indicates a fault in the structure of the remainder of a complex request, such as that the implied length is incorrect. It specifically does NOT mean that a data item submitted for storage in a register has a value outside the expectation of the application program, since the MODBUS protocol is unaware of the significance of any particular value of any particular register..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.IllegalFunction
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The function code received in the query is not an allowable action for the server (or slave). This may be because the function code is only applicable to newer devices, and was not implemented in the unit selected. It could also indicate that the server (or slave) is in the wrong state to process a request of this type, for example because it is unconfigured and is being asked to return register values..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.MemoryParityError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specialized use in conjunction with function codes 20 and 21 and reference type 6, to indicate that the extended file area failed to pass a consistency check..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.NetworkBytesNotEven
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Array networkBytes must contain an even number of bytes..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.SlaveDeviceBusy
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specialized use in conjunction with programming commands. The server (or slave) is engaged in processing a longduration program command. The client (or master) should retransmit the message later when the server (or slave) is free..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.SlaveDeviceFailure
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An unrecoverable error occurred while the server (or slave) was attempting to perform the requested action..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.SlaveExceptionResponseFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Function Code: {1}{0}Exception Code: {2} - {3}.

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.SlaveExceptionResponseInvalidFunctionCode
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid function code value for SlaveExceptionResponse..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.TimeoutNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The compact framework UDP client does not support timeouts..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.UdpClientNotConnected
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UdpClient must be bound to a default remote host. Call the Connect method..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.Unknown
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unknown slave exception code..

member.name: P:Modbus.Resources.WaitRetryGreaterThanZero
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to WaitToRetryMilliseconds must be greater than 0..
